At the press conference, Stephen Elop outlined how the Microsoft partnership is good for Nokia. Then Stephen Elop delivered the understatement of 2011. We believe this partnership is also good for Microsoft. Let's assume that over the next three years Nokia's Symbian operating system largely gets replaced by Windows Phone 7. Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. Reggie Jackson 's really what I did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night
